sub_title: Co-founder Bohemi Digital & Ibiza Secret Picnic, entrepreneur & web designer. Committed to a lifetime of learning & development.
summary:
Ana is the co-founder of Bohemi Digital, a creative marketing agency based in Ibiza with a global portfolio.
She is an entrepreneur and a problem solver - you will find her having dinner in a restaurant and while enjoying food she would come up with ideas on how the restaurant could increase their revenue by making small adjustments on the menu or in their service. She does achieve this online - by building websites that convert and fulfil her client's goals.

She starts with the end in mind and focuses on the objectives of the business and then finds the most effective ways to achieve them through digital marketing.

She lived in more than 5 countries, including USA, Ireland, the Netherlands, Romania and Spain and has a Masters in Economics and Business Administration. She worked 10 years in 5 star luxury Hotels but when she turned 30, she decided to challenge herself more, quit her job and studied web development because she was curious about how technology works. She became a Full Stack Web Developer and a Career Coach in IT, supporting others to follow their dreams. 
She believes that we can achieve anything we wish for in life when we are clear about where we want to go.

Before starting her own company, she worked as an E-Commerce Engineer, helping companies build their online presence through Web Design and Conversion Rate Optimisation.

Besides building professional websites, she is driven by the business strategy meetings she has with her clients, helping them grow from an idea and a passion, to a profitable business.

She is a hopeless romantic and turned her passion of creating luxury unforgettable romantic experiences into a successful business. If you are in Ibiza and are looking for something unique and spectacular to do, check out Ibiza Secret Picnic - a luxury picnic company dedicated to create bespoke experiences, also specialised in designing the most romantic marriage proposals. 
Website: www.ibizasecretpicnic.com 
Email: info@ibizasecretpicnic.com

school.name: Academia de Studii Economice din București

certifications.name: Learning Data Science: Understanding the Basics

profile_positions.description:
A creative marketing agency based in Ibiza with a global portfolio.

We design, build and market your digital presence, with a clear focus on creating outstanding mobile experiences.

www.bohemidigital.com
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Welcome to Ibiza Secret Picnic, where every occasion should be celebrated in style. 

We believe that when you visit Ibiza, you should be able to immerse yourself in the moment, free from the burden of decision-making. Our vision is to create unforgettable experiences where you can simply be and surrender to the magic that surrounds you.

At Ibiza Secret Picnic, we specialize in offering speakeasy luxury picnic experiences in hidden, breathtaking locations nestled within nature. Each experience is carefully curated to provide a sense of wonder and surprise, allowing you to embrace the unknown. 
On the day of your picnic, the exact location will be revealed, adding an element of anticipation and excitement to your journey.

Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, seeking the most romantic marriage proposal , or simply craving an escape from the ordinary, Ibiza Secret Picnic invites you to trust the process, let go of control, and surrender to the enchantment of Ibiza.

Embark on an adventure with us, where nature's beauty and the mystery of of favorite Ibiza locations combine to create unforgettable memories.
profile_positions.title: Founder & Owner

profile_positions.description:
Using my coding and analytical skills gained as a Certified Full Stack Developer, I help career changers to transition into technology.  
Using the 4 years managerial expertise gained in the hospitality industry, I guide professionals through employability strategies by providing a range of services to develop their soft skill sets. To prepare them for the job market, I organise workshops on interviewing techniques and best practices, preparation of CVs and résumes, support on how to engage in networking opportunities and self-reflection. 

I organise tech events to bring quality information & knowledge to the students, looking to get involved in making an impact.
profile_positions.title: IT Career Advisory, Student Experience & Talent Management

profile_positions.description:
Learned to develop and worked independently on web projects in both Front-end and Back-end with a focus on design and user experience. 
Languages & technologies:

JavaScript and Vue js
AJAX 
JSON
RESTful APIs
Bootstrap 3, HTML5, CSS
Java
Spring Boot

Built - Salvo, Battleship Game
Developed a front-end web-app using JavaScript, Vue JS and J Query -  with a back end server using Spring-Boot framework for the Java-based RESTful web server. 

Developed single page web app:
Designed a mobile web app for a football club, optimally viewable and functional on a mobile device’s browser. 

Weather app – API keys & geolocation

-Created responsive designs that work for various screen sizes and rotations;  Media Queries. 
-Designed UI and UX flow in Balsamiq and mockups.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
The Merrion ranked in the 'Top 5' in Europe for service | Leading Hotels of the World |

•	served as the property Manager on Duty and overseen all property operations, ensured that the highest levels of hospitality and service are provided. 
•	represented property management in resolving any guest or staff related situation. 
conducted site inspections for prospective business and guests, met journalists, bloggers & media in the absence of the Sales representatives and conducted show-arounds.
•	Handled complaints, settled disputes, and resolved grievances and conflicts.
•	Went above and beyond for guest satisfaction and retention. 
•	Improved service by communicating and assisting team members to understand guest needs, providing guidance, feedback, and individual coaching when needed.
•	Interacted with guests on a regular basis to obtain feedback on quality of product, service levels and overall satisfaction - organized reports with findings and suggestions.
profile_positions.title: Guest Relations, Manager on Duty

profile_positions.description:
•	Supervised Reception operations and led the Reception team to understand and apply correct procedures during the shift while providing a consistent, high level of customer service
•	Demonstrated positive leadership characteristics to inspire Team Members to meet and exceed standards
•	Conducted training and re-training of team members, when necessary 
•	Assisted other departments and maintain excellent working relationships with other hotel leaders and departments.
profile_positions.title: Front Office Supervisor

company.name: The Shelbourne Dublin, A Renaissance Hotel

profile_positions.description:
Leadership development in areas including Revenue Management, Sales & Marketing, Events, Finance, Front Office, Human Resources, Accommodation, Food & Beverage (Bar, Restaurant, Lounge, Banqueting), Engineering and Spa.

Revenue Management
-supported the analysing, forecasting, and optimisation of hotel inventory through availability restrictions and dynamic rates
-forecasting beyond room revenue, including F&B, payroll and other guest spent and looked at ways to maximise them;
-worked closely with the Director of Rooms and Sales & Marketing to align the revenue strategy with marketing efforts; 
- STR daily meetings with the Executive Team and weekly Revenue Management meeting with forecasting & recommendations. 

Sales & Marketing 
- managed 5 websites while meeting the target of getting them ranked  higher through SEO
- ensured the property's brand website is promoted as the primary  distribution channel - created & sent E-Newsletters & E-zines based on marketing strategies
- coordinated the development and distribution of promotional and  collateral to support hotel's marketing and sales programs 
- assisted the Sales & Marketing Director in the delivery of marketing  initiatives and pitched in ideas; 
- developed, coordinated and implemented promotions and adverts  through  traditional  (Irish  Times, National Concert Hall  ads, etc) and  digital marketing 
- coordinated marketing activities and promotions for events –  launching of The Salon within the Hotel; Media Day, etc. 
- hosted and coordinated social events - Annual Christmas Tree Lighting;  The Ryan Tubridy Radio Show - live from The Shelbourne; launching of the  Shelbourne TV Series, season 2.
- conducted Marketing Presentations for GM and Executive team and  presented recommendations ;
- liaised with the PR company in organising special events and  campaigns; 
- represented and promoted the Hotel in meetings with journalists, PR  and high profile guests.
profile_positions.title: Marriott Voyage: Leadership Development Program

company.name: The Shelbourne Dublin, A Renaissance Hotel

profile_positions.description: A national treasure built in 1824, the Shelbourne Hotel has been magnificently restored while keeping its historic charm. The Shelbourne is a luxury 5-star hotel in Dublin city center overlooking St. Stephen's Green, Europe's grandest garden square.
profile_positions.title: Front Office Receptionist
